text: A concept album is a kind of album in which all the songs are about the same thing. Most of the time, they tell a story. == Examples == Examples of concept albums are: *Lemonade by Beyonc√© *American Idiot by Green Day *All of Coheed and Cambria's studio albums *Thick as a Brick by Jethro Tull *Most of Pink Floyd's albums *Clockwork Angels by Rush *The Black Parade by My Chemical Romance == Sources == * New York Post article about American Idiot
title: Concept album
